column1: 1707|seven minutes past five|As I looked at its huge dial
column2: and at the pendulum moving to and fro regularly and slowly in Space
column3: as if its swinging meant to divide eternity
column4: I saw its needles pointing to seven minutes past five.
began chirruping. He stood on the body of his owner
column6: with his forepaws on the sill of the balcony
column7: stared through the green rattan blinds
column8: and trembled. He could see the farmer in the field
column9: and Edward asleep on the next balcony.
